about_the_game:
Unlocks exclusive Lei Costume: Uroboros Combat Uniform: Cyber Blue

Playable character Lei must first be unlocked in order to use this item, either by completing certain in-game objectives or by purchasing "Playable Character Lei Instant Unlock".

Unlocks exclusive Lei Costume: Uroboros Combat Uniform: Cyber Blue

Playable character Lei must first be unlocked in order to use this item, either by completing certain in-game objectives or by purchasing "Playable Character Lei Instant Unlock".
